songs.title: ベルリン (Berlin -Jap)
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Bokku ga subete no majitsu wo
Motto sakki kara shitte iireba ii na
De aoo

[Verse 2]
Moshi mou ichido chansu ga areba
Jibun orokasa ni kutzukereba ii na
Do ode mo ii

[Pre-Chorus]
Moshi kimi ga nigetai no nara
Boku gasu ni ite ageru yo

[Chorus]
Doko ikoo? Kimi doko?
Issho ni ikoo?
Aishite kuretara nandatte dekiruyo

[Verse 3]
Bokku ga subete no majitsu wo
Motto sakki kara shitte iireba ii na
Do ode mo ii

[Verse 4]
Tori ni tsuku made no michi no
Toki ni suma tsuki koro nari suru yo
Kyori da

[Pre-Chorus]
Moshi kimi ga nigetai no nara
Boku gasu ni ite ageru yo

[Chorus]
Doko ikoo? Kimi doko?
Issho ni ikoo?
Aishite kuretara nandatte dekiruyo

[Verse 3]
Bokku ga subete no majitsu wo
Motto sakki kara shitte iireba ii na
Do ode mo ii

[Verse 4]
Tori ni tsuku made no michi no
Toki ni suma tsuki koro nari suru yo
Kyori da

[Pre-Chorus]
Moshi kimi ga nigetai no nara
Boku gasu ni ite ageru yo

[Chorus]
Doko ikoo? Kimi doko?
Issho ni ikoo?
Aishite kuretara nandatte dekiruyo

[Pre-Chorus]
Moshi kimi ga nigetai no nara
Boku gasu ni ite ageru yo

[Chorus]
Doko ikoo? Kimi doko?
Issho ni ikoo?
Aishite kuretara nandatte dekiruyo
